data.title: Citizen Services Desk
data.meta_description: Find out more about the Citizen Services Desk.
data.text:
Ways to Report Non-Emergency Issues:

1.) Submit a Request Online

2.) By Phone: (843) 724-7311

Citizen Service Desk

The Citizen Services Desk connects residents to services and information. Contact us to report a problem, request a service or ask a question about a city service. Our hours of operation are Monday through Friday 8:30 a.m. to 5 p.m.

New Requests & Status Checks

How to report a new request or check the status of an existing request:

Phone: 843-724-7311

Report a problem using our Citizen Support Center

Email the Citizen Services Desk

Most Frequently Requested Services

Ditch Cleaning

Garbage Roll Cart Requests or Complaint

Get a Pothole Fixed

Missed Garbage Collection

Missed Trash Collection

Overgrown Yard or Vacant Lot

Pay a Parking Ticket

Sidewalk Repair

Street Drains or Driveway Pipe Cleaning

Information That Helps Citizen Services Address Your Issue

Location: Where is the problem or request located? (Address, intersection, in front of what business, north/south side of street, NE/SE corner, etc.)

Description: What exactly is the issue or condition? (as much detail as you can provide)

Timeframe: How long has this issue/condition existed or when did you first notice it?

Contact information: What is your name and email address? (if you would like to receive information about the resolution to your issue we need to enter your email address into our Customer Request Management (CRM) system)

Process Your Service Request Will Follow
